name: RichText
description: Represents a RichText object in a Paragraph.

properties.name: id
properties.description: Gets the ID of the RichText object.

properties.name: paragraph
properties.description: Gets the Paragraph object that contains the RichText object.

properties.name: text
properties.description: Gets the text content of the RichText object.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fills the proxy object created in JavaScript layer with property and object values specified in the parameter.

parameters.name: param
parameters.description: Accepts parameter and relationship names as delimited string or an array. Or, provide [loadOption](loadoption.md) object.
